name: Zombie Survival (Prototype)
description:
This is my first itch.io upload so this is probably a messy release page, so bear with me!

This is a prototype for a 3d zombie arena survival style game (Think endless horde arena like COD: Zombies). 

THIS PROJECT IS IN NO WAY SHAPE OR DONE!

 It is slow and simply an app I created that helped teach me a lot about how to optimize a game to work properly. As I get better at creating games, I may come back to this and completely renovate it into a feasible game. This is my first attempt at making a 3D FPS game.

Also this project is 100+mb until I figure out how to reduce file sizes, cheers!
